content.question: The change in the weather in the fifth paragraph (“Look . . . started”) has which effect on Mrs. Chandler?

choices.label: She links the gray sky with her own depression.
She slips into a memory of a happy time.
She feels remorse for a past transgression.
She associates the darkness with a bleak future.

content.answer: She slips into a memory of a happy time.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
